title: Never thought I'd have a ranked game trolled/ruined by a Rioter
body:
http://imgur.com/MYDIZvA

This is from my other account that happened today, he didn't seem to give a fuck and just ran around doing whatever.
Nobody on the team did exceptionally well, but 2 of the guys were excited to have their first game with a Rioter & It's a shame this happened.

replies.body:
Well if a Rioter is called "Rice" I'd expect him to be in the Garena servers, not OCE

Warning: Do not read text from pics on iPad
what did oyu mean about the ipad?
I read 'Riot' as 'Rice' due to the small picture size
I dont think that is a real riot staff member.
Riot are condoning it this season.
